content: “And when the time comes”—’s Decree!—“I’ll see to it that they dig up the bones of the kings of Judah, the bones of the princes and priests and prophets, and yes, even the bones of the common people. They’ll dig them up and spread them out like a congregation at worship before sun, moon, and stars, all those sky gods they’ve been so infatuated with all these years, following their ‘lucky stars’ in doglike devotion. The bones will be left scattered and exposed, to reenter the soil as fertilizer, like manure.
“Everyone left—all from this evil generation unlucky enough to still be alive in whatever godforsaken place I will have driven them to—will wish they were dead.” Decree of -of-the-Angel-Armies.
To Know Everything but God’s Word
“Tell them this, ’s Message:
“‘Do people fall down and not get up?
So why does this people go backward,
They stubbornly hold on to their illusions,
I listened carefully
No one expressed one word of regret.
They just kept at it, blindly and stupidly
Cranes know when it’s time
And robins, warblers, and bluebirds
But my people? My people know nothing,
“‘I went out to see if I could salvage anything’”
Not a grape, not a fig,
I’m taking back
Advancing from One Evil to the Next
I drown in grief.
Oh, listen! Please listen! It’s the cry of my dear people
Is  no longer in Zion?
Can you tell me why they flaunt their plaything-gods,
The crops are in, the summer is over,
For my dear broken people, I’m heartbroken.
Are there no healing ointments in Gilead?
So why can’t something be done
